channel.title: Boot Camp on Adventures in Hugo
channel.description: Recent content in Boot Camp on Adventures in Hugo

item.title: VMware VCAP-DCD Boot Camp
item.description: [caption id=“” align=“alignright” width=“240”] Danbo Boot Camp © Daniel Lee[/caption] A while before VMworld Europe 2013 in Barcelona, I was lucky enough to be asked by John Arrasjid if I wanted to help out reviewing the new VCAP-DCD boot camp VMware Education has been working on. So far the VCAP Design Boot Camp has been tested in Spain, Singapore, and Malaysia, with over 300 participants so far. In addition to this, a two part vBrownbag series covering the boot camp content was recorded and released:
